Header: Warnings for Ramba virus in computers
Content: The Computer Emergency Response Team has requested to be vigilant about a computer virus which is spreading at present. An Engineer of the team said that the virus could enter computers through free downloads. He said it can also enter the computers through the e-mail. The Computer Emergency Response Team has requested the public to inform them about any such incidents over the phone number 0112 â€“ 69 16 92.
